name: RetrievePastIncidents
description:
Retrieve past incidents related to a specific incident.

Use this tool to obtain a list of past incidents from the same service that share metadata with a given incident. Useful for analyzing historical incident data related to a service within the past 6 months. Requires authorization with scoped OAuth using `incidents.read`. Only available with Event Intelligence or Digital Operations plans.
